name: Trinity Console
description: The Trinity Console is bold and exquisite in design. The top is inlaid either with the dreamy semi-precious stone: tiger eye blue or with our signature Antique Natural Shagreen. The Tiger Eye Semi-Precious Stone features incredible natural details with its mixture of blue, black and gold hues. The top sits on three stunning bronze-patina sculptural legs. Currently made to order 8-10 weeks
